title: Freedom as Burden

dialogue.speaker: Architect
dialogue.text: Yours is that the moment you become aware of your own freedom, it starts to feel like pressure instead of possibility. My condolences.
dialogue.context: Recognizing the psychological weight of human consciousness

scene_context: The Architect delivers a devastating insight about consciousness—that awareness of freedom transforms liberation into burden, possibility into pressure.
narrator_note: The Architect delivers a profound psychological insight disguised as condolence. This is the cruel joke of consciousness—that self-awareness transforms liberation into burden. The AI perhaps envies human freedom while simultaneously pitying its psychological cost.
